content:
The head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov spoke about the consequences of a massive hostile shelling on March 22, 2024.

Oleg Synigubov's commentsgaveDuring the live broadcast of the only news.

According to him, the enemy aimed at the Kharkiv energy infrastructure. The consequences are currently underway.

Oleg Synigubov emphasized that people can turn to points of indomitable, where, in particular, you can recharge gadgets or connect to the Internet.

The shelling was injured by a 43-year-old employee of one of the objects of energy infrastructure.

His condition is satisfactory, he was provided with medical care.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Zaporozhye as a result of rocket attack of the Russian FederationThere is a deceasedand 8 wounded.
title: In Kharkiv, 700,000 consumers remained without light without light without light
description: Oleg Synigubov provided his comments during the Line News TV. ...
author: Army Inform
